lead_paragraph: In the 79 years the Masters has been played, only one player has made a hole-in-one on the long and deceptively difficult par-3 fourth hole.

headline.print_headline: A Lone Palm and a Lot of Trouble on the 4th Hole at Augusta
headline.main: A Lone Palm and a Lot of Trouble on the 4th Hole at Augusta

snippet: In the 79 years the Masters has been played, only one player has made a hole-in-one on the long and deceptively difficult par-3 fourth hole....
